reviewText: Thank you i love this movie and have been looking for it everywhere. Its a sad but great movie. I would recommend it to anyone cause a heartwarming story.

I was honestly heartbroken when the good intentions of new found friends fall short of fullfillment.  But the result from this initial disappointment was very inspirational and heartwarming.  The two boys struggle to overcome differencies in childhood and expectations through initial rivalry, then concern, compassion, and a lasting friendship as they set their united goal to secure the only Christmas present a deformed but angelic sister desires. Tis tragic and heartwrenching but serves to illustrate how God and determination can transform a tragic event into an everlasting miracle.

For those of us born early enough the the twentieth century to remember the charm of paper routes, Christmas pageants, family values and a great Christmas message, this is the film for you to watch with your children and grandchildren.
The movie does a good job of bringing Bledsoe's true story to life.
thank you great job keep it up
Very touching story of real children in  the  50's.  Great read!
One of my favorite Christmas movies!
Wonderful movie, we watch it several times each year and never tire of it.
I searched for years for this movie. I bought it from here for awesome price. We watched the movie with our 6 children on christmas eve and they loved it.
This is just one of the best Christmas movies ever.  Very sweet and very touching.  One of my favorites that I have in my collection.  YOU WILL REALLY ENJOY.....
I love the home-style, heart-warming, Christmas story that makes life seem kinder.  We only hear about the bad things in life and this film is uplifting and joyful.  Great film for kids too.
